experience: You and Sidney both know Troy Busot, Adwait Ullal, and 57 others
Sidney can introduce you to 14 people at Sift Science

Incredibly excited to be representing GitHub this morning at Massachusetts Institute of Technology Alumini Virtual Career Fair!  If you are interested in a role and are an Alum meet me in the virtual lobby at 9pst/12est today!  Ellen E. Stahl GREAT JOB!

GitHub is the best place to share code with friends, co-workers, classmates, and complete strangers. As of December 2016, GitHub reports having more than 16 million users and more than 40 million projects, making us the largest host of source code in the world.Come help us make collaboration even better. At GitHub we build the tools that make collaborating and writing software easier. We've built a company we truly love working for, and we think you will too.Career Site: https://github.com/about/jobs
Principal Engineering Partner I Strategy and Programs

What does Sift Science do?We're a well funded Series C startup that uses machine learning to fight fraud for online businesses like Twitter, Airbnb and HotelTonight. Behind the scenes we're building distributed microservices that handle hundreds of millions of events per day. How? We use AWS, Hadoop, Hbase, Spark, etc. and through really talented team. Every day, businesses worldwide rely on Sift Science to automate fraud prevention, slash costs, and grow revenue. Our cloud-based machine learning platform is powered by 16,000+ fraud signals updated in real-time from activity across our global network of 6,000+ websites (and growing).Check out our Engineering Blog:  https://engineering.siftscience.comWe are hiring in downtown San Francisco - Please review roles here:https://siftscience.com/careers

What they do at Early Warning: Whether you are transacting with a smart phone, a card or a check, chances are Early Warning is there, ensuring the transaction is fast, safe and secure. For more than 20 years, Early Warning has facilitated a trusted data exchange to help organizations fight fraud, reduce operational costs and enhance customer service. Our suite of proprietary solutions use collaborative data – contributed by an array of financial services organizations, large and small – and advanced analytical modeling to secure the global financial services system.

Livongo Health is reinventing the way we manage chronic conditions by blending the power of technology, real-time information and human support to make life easier for people with chronic conditions. And we're starting with diabetes.
Engineering Talent Partner - Strategy and Programs
Supporting Core Engineering for Apple Pay, Applied Machine Learning, Customer/Corporate Systems and Retail. Subject Matter Expert in Senior Level Platform Engineering, DevOps Eng and UI/UX layer.
recommendations: William G Dubyak, PhD
IBM Distinguished Engineer and NLP/Machine Learning Engineer/
Captain, USNavy (Ret)
October 4, 2017, Sidney was a client of William G’S

On of my main professional mantras is that one never forgets the first contact with Sidney Miller.   I have known Sidney for over 5 years, and in that time she has helped me, several members of my family, and many of my colleagues.   Sidney is an extraordinary recruiter.  She has the singular ability to make each candidate feel they're her only candidate.  She radiates excitement at the possibilities of each encounter; she sees only strengths, and behaves like a continuous optimization algorithm solving for perfect fit.   What really separates her from the pack is her boundless energy; at every point in the search she projects assurance and enthusiasm.  I can recall feeling that, in her hands, the perfect role was both inevitable and imminent.  In a tight labor market, where the demand for skills far outstrips supply, Sidney will be your discriminator; her candidates trust her, and want to stay in her care.  If I really needed a job, there is no one I'd rather have on my side.  Sidney really is the best.
William G Dubyak, PhD

Chief Risk Officer | Info Security | Resiliency and Response | Third Party Risk | Speaker
September 27, 2016, Suzanne worked with Sidney in different groups

I first met Sidney when she recruited me for my current role at Early Warning.  She was so passionate about the company and energized about her role in helping the company grow that I couldn't help but be impressed.  One thing that was extremely unusual in my experience in being recruited is how focused Sidney was on me.  I felt in every interaction - and they were frequent - that I was her only candidate, not just for the particular role but her only candidate overall.  She was so good at making me feel that I would be an important addition to Early Warning that I couldn't help but feel special.  After I joined the company, I found out that Sidney was recruiting dozens of people at the same time which made me wonder how she was able to accomplish this.  Since then, I've spoken with others that were recruited by Sidney and she made them all feel that way.  Sidney has integrity, loyalty, passion and is highly charged up about making her company successful through the right hires.

September 19, 2016, Heather worked with Sidney in different groups

I had the pleasure of working with Sidney when I was being recruited by Early Warning. Often times as a candidate you feel like you are in a black hole of resumes and no one is championing you. My experience working with Sidney was very different. She made me feel "courted" by the company. She contacted me often to inform me that I was still in the running for the position and had me interview with several people to make sure they were finding the right fit for me. I appreciated her professionalism, thoughtfulness and ability to navigate the leaders in company to make hiring decisions.  When I was hired at Early Warning, Sidney and her team reached out to me and offered a sincere congratulations and stepped me through the on boarding process in detail. Because of Sidney, my hiring experience was extremely  positive and I was thrilled to start on my first day.

April 17, 2015, Nik was a client of Sidney’s

Nik Ogura is simply awesome.  There were several things that we had to overcome when starting this journey together.   He was able to remain nimble throughout the process and was able to navigate several interviews with ease.  He holds a consistent positive outlook and is completely solution oriented.  He came to the table with serious experience but also an open mind and great perspective.  He has an incredible personality and know that with his technical skills paired with his attitude - he will create amazing things.  One of the best candidates I have worked with!!

summary: I am a working Mom, a huge Arizona Wildcat Alumni and I am a subject matter expert that exudes massive amounts of passion for the recruiting lifecycle, from the inception of the candidate experience - past their first day in the organization. I am a student of the tech market on a daily basis. I am an innovator, and I reach outside of the box to challenge the norm to grow organizations past what they know is possible. I drive collaborative think tank discussions that create new and catalytic ideas.
